professional_summary: Database Administrator with over 8 years of experience in database design, monitoring, tuning, migration, and replication. Proficient in Oracle and MS SQL Server, with expertise in high availability and disaster recovery solutions. Proven leadership skills in cross-functional collaboration.

key_responsibilities: Design and implementation of databases for high availability and disaster recovery.
Experience with database migration and replication tools.
Proficiency in Oracle and MS SQL Server for performance tuning.
Performance tuning using AMM and ASMM tools.
Security management through role-based access control.
Oracle installations and upgrades using DBCA and OFA tools.
Backup strategies with RMAN and block chain tracking for efficiency.
Capacity planning to support database growth.

technical_skills:
Database migration and design",
            "Oracle and MS SQL Server expertise",
            "Replication and high availability solutions",
            "Performance tuning with AMM and ASMM",
            "Backup strategies using RMAN
